title: NAUGHTY hotwife on vacation: Steamy BWBM Erotica Novelette, with Wife Swapping, Swinger Couples
description: “Tie your suit up”, she said. “You don’t want to lose your drawers while you’re swimming…”Daniel and Samantha are vacationing in Honduras, in an attempt to spice up their once bustling sex life. Tiger and Marc are adventurous swingers on the Island looking for new couples to introduce their adventurous and erotic lifestyle to. They set their eyes on the very attractive Daniel and Samantha. Will they give in to the delicious temptation of hot swinger sex, or perhaps experiment with menage romance and put the spice back in their life, or will they remain in their current dormant sex life? This steamy BWBM Romance short story will have you moaning for more and waiting breathlessly for the next book in this sensuous African American Romance series.Page Up and Order Now.
author: Jae John-Rose
